At this point, as Straight Shot, =
Wheelie, and Rattrap all semeed set by a tumble..

Wheelie, estimating over=
 when Straight Shot was rolling towards him, and when Rattrap was going to =
trip him, ducked out of the way over to slide past the duo.

And not drawin=
g a weapon, "If you two think that is worth an 'oops' I'd hate to see you t=
ake things out of your caboose.  If that's the best that you two can do, I'=
ll say I'm sorry to the two of you.  Since you both can't do that, I'll say=
 it's not worth being a brat.  If you two can barely work so well, then I'd=
 hate to see you in a shell.  No offense, but if you can't do that, it's no=
t worth trying to hit you up for chat."

Leaning back against the wall, the=
n turning his attention back to LEO PRIME, and crossing his arms over as th=
e discussion turned back to RODIMUS.
